HEADER.DESCRIPTION: We have big ideas on how to improve your healthcare experience. We navigate for better corporate health benefits that will help the best companies in Indonesia take better care of their employees.

CARD.DESCRIPTION: Prixa is a pioneer in the management of corporate health benefits accessible on a single platform. Prixa provides better experience and accessibility to health care through engaged member advocacy, connected administration, and curated employee benefits.
CARD.DESCRIPTION2: With Prixa, you are free to select the best partners suitable for you. Prixa provides a wide range of healthcare services to corporates, including claims administration, benefits management, and health care concierge services. This platform brings all services into one ecosystem, allowing you to measure and grow your investment efficiently.

CARD2.STREAMLINE: Streamline your day-to-day with adjudication, eligibility, billing, payments, and partners in one integrated experience.
CARD2.SIMPLIFIED: Our simplified and intuitive member experience, including navigation and advocacy, actively engages employees in their benefits.
CARD2.MIXMATCH: Mix and match from partners across medical, dental, vision, pharmacy, and point solutions.
CARD2.SOLUTION: A single connected benefits ecosystem for members and benefits leaders alike.

WHAT_WE_DO.QUOTE: We have big ideas on how to improve your healthcare experience. We navigate for better corporate health benefits that will help the best companies in Indonesia take better care of their employees.

MEMBER_FOCUS.HEADING: Member-focused advocacy
MEMBER_FOCUS.DESCRIPTION: Our caring Member Advocates and clinicians meet your employees where they are in their health journey, helping to guide and support them on the path to better healthcare decisions.

HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Many people in Indonesia do not completely comprehend and have access to health insurance. Prixa is here to simplify the process in an easy-to-understand way so that you can get the most comprehensive protection and have optimal health benefits according to your needs.

MOBILE_EXPERIENCE.IN_YOUR_HAND: Everything you need to know is in your hand
MOBILE_EXPERIENCE.ON_OUR_MOBILE: On our mobile application, you can get access to various health services, including teleconsultation with doctors, lab tests, diagnostics, pharmacy delivery, the redemption of drug prescriptions, and hospital referrals.
MOBILE_EXPERIENCE.NO_NEED_WORRY: No need to worry when an error occurs
MOBILE_EXPERIENCE.YOU_CAN_CONTACT: You can contact our team directly via phone or online chat. We'll make sure you get the answers you need
MOBILE_EXPERIENCE.API_INTEGRATION: API or web-based integration that is easy to integrate with client applications/websites (whitelabelled). The website can also be accessed by all clients no apps or non website.
MOBILE_EXPERIENCE.SPEND_ENERGY: You don't have to spend a lot of energy to understand the medical speak. All information has been translated into simple language so you can choose the benefits that you really want.

HEADER.IMPROVE_HEALTH: Improve your health without getting complicated administration.
HEADER.COMPREHENSIVE: A comprehensive solution for flexible and integrated health service needs for companies.

BENEFIT_OFFER.NOW_DESCRIPTION: By incorporating sophisticated and advanced technology, Prixa helps you manage health administration and investment more efficiently.
BENEFIT_OFFER.SIMPLIFIED_DESCRIPTION: Our integrated system allows you to easily find solutions without compromising your day-to-day operations.
BENEFIT_OFFER.ELIBILITY_DESCRIPTION: Sending different eligibility files to your partners can be tiresome. With Prixa, you no longer have to deal with it. You only have to send us one eligibility file, and we will take care of the rest.
BENEFIT_OFFER.EFFECTIVELY_DESCRIPTION: Cost management can be concerning. Prixa is here to help you manage costs more effectively and receive accurate reporting with zero time wasted.
BENEFIT_OFFER.ACCESS_DESCRIPTION: We provide all information related to your investment whenever it is necessary. Just by reaching us, you can gain the access you need.

NETWORK.SOLUTION: Our solution works with designated network partners across medical, pharmacy, dental, and vision plans. We can fill the gaps in your existing frameworks to provide a more comprehensive benefits offering that delivers more value.

HIGHLIGHT.BELIEVE: We believe that every employee deserves access to health services that does not impose hardship. Hence, Prixa provides affordable health programs and products your employees can easily access without adding more work.
HIGHLIGHT.WITH: With our data and analytical capabilities, we will find you the best digital health partners that suit your needs.
HIGHLIGHT.INTREGATION: With the integrations designed by our team, we make anything you need accessible, including data sharing, billing management, and accounting.
HIGHLIGHT.THROUGH: Through an innovative digital-first approach, we match members to programs most suitable for their needs.
